clientArea.title: Client Area

gamePanel.title: Game Panel
gamePanel.description: Control your game servers with our panel

hero.title: Game Hosting
hero.description: Fast, reliable, and secure hosting for your gaming communities. Launch dedicated servers with instant setup, DDoS protection, and 24/7 support.

stats.uptimeDesc: Enterprise redundancy keeping your servers online.
stats.supportDesc: Expert help with installs, mods, and server ops.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.description: Our platform is built from the ground up to deliver the best possible gaming experience for you and your players.

about.title: Built by Gamers,
about.description: We understand what gamers need because we are gamers. NodeByte was founded with a simple mission: provide reliable, high-performance game hosting without the complexity.

pricing.title: Server Plans
pricing.description: Flexible plans to match your needs. All plans include DDoS protection, instant setup, and 24/7 support.
pricing.comingSoonDescription: We're working on bringing you the best hosting experience. Join our Discord to be notified when we launch!
pricing.customSolution: Need a custom solution or have questions?

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Got questions? We've got answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to reach out to our support team.

games.title: Choose Your
games.description: Select from our range of supported games. Each platform is optimized for the best possible performance.

contact.title: How Can We
contact.description: Our team is here to help. Choose your preferred method of contact below.

discord.title: Discord Community
discord.description: Join our Discord for real-time support and community discussions.

ticket.title: Support Ticket
ticket.description: Submit a ticket through our billing panel for account-related issues.

email.title: Email Us
email.description: Send us an email and we'll respond within 24 hours.

social.title: Follow Us
social.description: Stay updated with the latest news and announcements.

warning.title: Important Notice
warning.description: For the fastest response, we recommend using Discord for support. Our community and staff are most active there.

footer.tagline: Fast, reliable, scalable and secure hosting services for your gaming experience. Built for Humans. Powered by Bytes.
